name: @marioslab/ulang
description: Virtual machine & assembler for recreational programming like it's 1992.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ulang-vm && npm run build:ulang-site
scripts.build:wasm: ./build-wasm.sh -g && cp ulang-vm/src/ulang.wasm ulang-vm/dist && cp ulang-vm/src/ulang.wasm ulang-vm/dist/iife && cp ulang-vm/src/ulang.wasm ulang-site/dist/
scripts.build:ulang-vm: npm run build:wasm && npx esbuild --bundle ulang-vm/src/index.ts --tsconfig=ulang-vm/tsconfig.json  --sourcemap --outfile=ulang-vm/dist/iife/ulang.js --format=iife --global-name=ulang
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx live-server --no-browser" "npm run dev:wasm" "npm run dev:ulang-vm" "npm run dev:ulang-site"

author: Mario Zechner
